content: chunky beanie size yarn fits 19 -23 head circumference wool ease thick & quick stripes 5 oz 87 yds 1 skein hudson bay needles & accessories gauge size 11 us 16 circular needle 10 st=4 size 11 double pointed needles 14 row=4 stitch marker yarn needle chunky beanie this is a great basic fold-brim beanie that you can finish in an evening adding a pom pom on top will use up the rest of the skein stitches 2x2 rib - knit 2 purl 2 repeat around stockinette stitch - knit every round k2tog - knit two stitches together measurements laying flat 11 5 length from cast on to top 9 width directions co 44 2x2 ribbing for 2 5 stockinette stitch for 5 from end of ribbing begin decreases round 1 knit 20 k2tog repeat 42 st round 2 and all even rounds knit round 3 *k5 k2tog* repeat around 36 st round 5 *k4 k2tog* repeat around 30 st round 7 *k3 k2tog* repeat around 24 st round 9 *k2 k2tog* repeat around 18 st round 11 *k1 k2tog* repeat around 12 st round 13 *k2tog* repeat around 6 st cut 6 tail thread through remaining 6 stitches weave in ends fold up brim and keep warm copyright 2015 lemos associates llc this pattern is for your personal use only and not to be used to create items for commercial gain michelle lemos nathipknits@gmail com naturally hip � page 2�
